Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
ANOTHER WAVE OF GUERILLA ATTACKS ON FLETCHER


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]:  In a now familiar pattern, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseLiao],House Liao]] has sent another round of mercenaries to support the efforts of Fletcher's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreXinSheng],Xin Sheng]] guerillas against the pro-Fedcom planetary militia.  Elements of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBroadstreetBs],Broadstreet Bullies]] and [[DM.Factions[faction_LethalInjection],Lethal Injection]] have been sighted on the planet sporting Liao colours. The planetary militia themselves, while holding their own, are also posting contracts for mercenaries to assist in the defence of their world.

Description.Name: MercNews Broadcast
Description.Details:
CAPH CITIZENS INVITE [[DM.Factions[faction_WordOfBlake],WORD OF BLAKE]] TO PACIFY PLANET


[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOutreach],Outreach]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreFedCom],Federated Commonwealth]]:  Encouraged by the Word of Blake's intervention and treatment of other [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreChaosMarch],Chaos March]] worlds, prominent citizen groups on Caph have requested the Word of Blake to settle the various conflicts on Caph.  While many in the Inner Sphere view the Word of Blake as techno-religious fanatics, the average Caphian has begun to see the Word of Blake as a sensible and justifiable alternative to the Great Houses, particularly as Houses [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseLiao],House Liao]] and [[DM.Factions[faction_Steiner],Steiner]]-[[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseDavion],Davion]] have been blamed for the near-constant warfare since [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreOpGuerrero],Operation GUERRERO]].


Already Blakist forces, led by mercenaries [[DM.Factions[faction_SimonsonsCutthroats],Simonson's Cutthroats]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCarsonsR],Carson's Renegades]], have secured landing zones on world and are moving on to seize Caph's main cities and spacesports.  In response, the planet's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLoyalist],Loyalist]] and [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAllied],Allied]] factions have formed a temporary truce to repel the Blakist threat.  Units including the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreSMM],Denebola SMM]], [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGustafsonGren],Gustafson's Grenadiers]] and the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDevilsAdv],Devil's Advocates]] mercenary command stand ready to repel the Blakist advance.
